class.name: RandomNumberGenerator
class.brief_description: A class for generation pseudo-random numbers.

method.name: randi
method.description: Generates pseudo-random 32-bit unsigned integer between '0' and '4294967295'.

method.name: randi_range
method.description: Generates pseudo-random 32-bit signed integer between [code]from[/code] and [code]to[/code] (inclusive).

method.name: randomize
method.description: Setups a time-based seed to generator.

members.member: The seed used by the random number generator. A given seed will give a reproducible sequence of pseudo-random numbers.
